effect.shortEffect: Doubles the Pokémon's stat modifiers. These doubled modifiers are still capped at -6 or 6 stages.
effect.full: Each stage of this Pokémon's stat modifiers acts as two stages. These doubled stages are still limited to a minimum of -6 and a maximum of 6. This Pokémon can still accumulate less than -3 or more than 3 stages of stat modifiers, even though the extra ones have no effect after doubling.

description.diamond-pearl: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.
